description: Carolina allspice (Calycanthus ‘SMNCAF' SIMPLY SCENTSATIONAL’) is an amazing plant species thanks to its unique and beautiful fragrant flowers. These flowering shrubs are native to the southeastern United States and can grow up to five feet high and wide. The deep green leaves and coral-pink flowers of this species make it an eye-catching addition to the landscape. The most intriguing feature of this species is its sweet, spicy scent reminiscent of a combination of cloves, allspice, and freshly-poured tea, making it the perfect addition to any garden or yard. With its low maintenance care requirements and a plethora of beneficial characteristics, it’s no wonder why this species is so beloved.
